pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Item_Cost_Update_History = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT
   SYSDATE EXTRACT_DATE,
   MP.ORGANIZATION_CODE,
   MSI.SEGMENT1 ITEM_NUMBER,
   CSC.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID,
   CSC.STANDARD_COST,
   CSC.STANDARD_COST_REVISION_DATE,
   CSC.COST_UPDATE_ID,
   CSC.COST_UPDATE_ID||'_'||CSC.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID COST_UPDATE_KEY
FROM
   APPS.CST_STANDARD_COSTS CSC,
   APPS.MTL_PARAMETERS MP,
   INV.MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B MSI 
WHERE
   CSC.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID 
   AND CSC.ORGANIZATION_ID = MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID 
   AND MP.ORGANIZATION_ID = MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID 
   AND MP.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"'
   ORDER BY COST_UPDATE_ID,CSC.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"STANDARD_COST", "Standard Cost"}, {"STANDARD_COST_REVISION_DATE", "Standard Cost Revision Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared M2 = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT
    entity,
    dept,
    acct,
    proj,
    interco,
    gl_period,
    gp.end_date period_end_date,
    item_number,
    item_description,
    cat_segment1,
    cat_segment2,
    cat_segment3,
    transaction_source,
    tb.inventory_item_id,
    tb.organization_id,
    vendor_id,
    sales_service_code,
    currency_code,
    conversion_rate,
    SUM(accounted_net)         accounted_net,
    SUM(accounted_net_usd)     accounted_net_usd,
    SUM(tran_qty)              transaction_quantity,
    m20_tbu,
    m20_pfc,
    allocation_percent,
    hfm_account,
    hp_account,
    hfm_icp,
    hfm_function,
    hfm_product,
    hp_product,
    hfm_product_group,
    hp_spc_account,
    alt_hfm_product,
    alt_hfm_product_group,
    alt_hp_product
FROM
    xxcoh.xxcoh_m2_report_tb tb,
    gl.gl_periods gp
WHERE
    entity = '"&ENTITY&"'
    AND tb.GL_PERIOD = gp.period_name
    AND PERIOD_SET_NAME = 'COHR Calendar'
GROUP BY
    entity,
    dept,
    acct,
    proj,
    interco,
    tbd,
    gl_period,
    gp.end_date,
    item_number,
    item_description,
    cat_segment1,
    cat_segment2,
    cat_segment3,
    transaction_source,
    currency_code,
    tb.inventory_item_id,
    tb.organization_id,
    set_of_books_id,
    vendor_id,
    sales_service_code,
    conversion_rate,
    m20_tbu,
    m20_pfc,
    allocation_percent,
    hfm_account,
    hp_account,
    hfm_icp,
    hfm_function,
    hfm_product,
    hp_product,
    hfm_product_group,
    hp_spc_account,
    alt_hfm_product,
    alt_hfm_product_group,
    alt_hp_product
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ENTITY", "Entity"}, {"DEPT", "Department"}, {"ACCT", "Account"}, {"PROJ", "Project"}, {"INTERCO", "Inter Company"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"ITEM_DESCRIPTION", "Description"}, {"TRANSACTION_QUANTITY", "Transaction Quantity"}, {"TRANSACTION_SOURCE", "Transaction Source"}, {"CURRENCY_CODE", "Currency"}, {"SALES_SERVICE_CODE", "Sales Service Code"}, {"ACCOUNTED_NET", "Accounted Net"}, {"ACCOUNTED_NET_USD", "Accounted Net USD"}, {"GL_PERIOD", "GL Period"}, {"PERIOD_END_DATE", "Period End Date"}, {"M20_TBU", "M20 TBU"}, {"M20_PFC", "M20 PFC"}, {"ALLOCATION_PERCENT", "Allocation Percent"}, {"HFM_ACCOUNT", "HFM Account"}, {"HP_ACCOUNT", "HP Account"}, {"HFM_ICP", "HFM ICP"}, {"HFM_FUNCTION", "HFM Function"}, {"HFM_PRODUCT", "HFM Product"}, {"HP_PRODUCT", "HP Product"}, {"HFM_PRODUCT_GROUP", "HFM Product Group"}, {"HP_SPC_ACCOUNT", "HP SPC Account"}, {"CAT_SEGMENT1", "Item TBU"}, {"CAT_SEGMENT2", "Item Product Family"}, {"CAT_SEGMENT3", "Item Product Line"}, {"ALT_HFM_PRODUCT", " Alternate HFM Product"}, {"ALT_HFM_PRODUCT_GROUP", "Alternate HFM Product Group"}, {"ALT_HP_PRODUCT", "Alternate HP Product"}}),
  #"Renamed columns 1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Renamed columns", {{" Alternate HFM Product", "Alternate HFM Product"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns 1";
shared ENTITY = let
  ENTITY = "660" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ENTITY;
shared ORG = let
  ORG = "LDP" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ORG;
shared EO_Reserve = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
  SELECT
   XRH.HEADER_STATUS,
   XRH.ORGANIZATION_ID,
   XRH.ORGANIZATION_CODE,
   XRH.PLAN_NAME,
   XRL.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID,
   XRL.LINE_STATUS,
   XRL.ITEM_NUMBER,
   XRL.FINAL_RESERVE_QUANTITY,
   XRL.FINAL_RESERVE_EXT_VALUE,
   XRL.FINAL_RESERVE_TRF_EXT_VALUE,
   XRL.FINAL_RESERVE_CATEGORY,
   XRL.FINAL_RESERVE_RATE,
   XRL.FINAL_RESERVE_TRF_AMOUNT,
   XRL.FINAL_RESERVE_AMOUNT_USD,
   XRL.FINAL_TAKEN_FROM,
   XRL.FINAL_FINANCE_APPROVE_DATE,
   XRL.ORGANIZATION_CATEGORY,
   XRL.RESERVE_DEPARTMENT,
   XRL.RESERVE_ACCOUNT,
   XRL.TBU,
   XRL.PRODUCT_FAMILY,
   XRL.PRODUCT_LINE,
   XRL.ORG_TBU,
   XRL.ORG_PRODUCT_FAMILY,
   XRL.ORG_PRODUCT_LINE,
   XRL.PLANNER_CODE,
   XRL.FIN_TBU,
   XRL.FIN_PRODUCT_FAMILY,
   XRL.PERIOD_NAME 
FROM
   APPS.XXCOH_RSV_HEADERS XRH,
   APPS.XXCOH_RSV_LINES XRL 
WHERE
   1 = 1 
   AND XRH.RESERVE_HEADER_ID = XRL.RESERVE_HEADER_ID 
   AND XRH.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"'
   "
   , CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"HEADER_STATUS", "Header Status"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"PERIOD_NAME", "GL Period Name"}, {"PLAN_NAME", "Plan Name"}, {"LINE_STATUS", "Line Status"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_QUANTITY", "Final Reserve Quantity"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_EXT_VALUE", "Final Reserve Ext Value"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_TRF_EXT_VALUE", "Final Reserve Trf Value"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_CATEGORY", "Final Reserve Category"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_RATE", "Final Reserve Rate"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_TRF_AMOUNT", "Final Reserve Trf Amount"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_AMOUNT_USD", "Final Reserve Amount USD"}, {"FINAL_TAKEN_FROM", "Final Taken From"}, {"FINAL_FINANCE_APPROVE_DATE", "Final Finance Approve Date"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CATEGORY", "Organization Category"}, {"RESERVE_DEPARTMENT", "Reserve Department"}, {"RESERVE_ACCOUNT", "Reserve Account"}, {"PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Product Family"}, {"PRODUCT_LINE", "Product Line"}, {"ORG_TBU", "ORG TBU"}, {"ORG_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "ORG Product Family"}, {"ORG_PRODUCT_LINE", "ORG Product Line"}, {"PLANNER_CODE", "Planner Code"}, {"FIN_TBU", "FIN TBU"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "FIN Product Family"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared GL_Reserve = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
  SELECT
   sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,
   GJH.JE_HEADER_ID,
   GCC.SEGMENT1,
   GCC.SEGMENT2,
   GCC.SEGMENT3,
   GCC.SEGMENT4,
   GCC.SEGMENT5,
   GCC.CODE_COMBINATION_ID,
   GJH.LEDGER_ID,
   GJH.JE_CATEGORY,
   GJH.JE_SOURCE,
   GJH.CURRENCY_CODE,
   GJH.POSTED_DATE,
   GJL.EFFECTIVE_DATE,
   GJL.PERIOD_NAME,
   GJL.ACCOUNTED_DR,
   GJL.ACCOUNTED_CR,
   nvl(GJL.ACCOUNTED_DR,0) - nvl(GJL.ACCOUNTED_CR,0) ACCOUNTED_NET,
   GJL.DESCRIPTION,
   GJL.ATTRIBUTE1,
   GJL.ATTRIBUTE2,
   GJL.ATTRIBUTE3,
   GJL.ATTRIBUTE4
FROM
   APPS.GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS GCC,
   APPS.GL_PERIOD_STATUSES GPS,
   APPS.GL_LEDGERS GL,
   APPS.GL_JE_LINES GJL,
   APPS.GL_JE_HEADERS GJH,
   APPS.ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD 
WHERE
   ORGANIZATION_CODE =  '"&ORG&"' 
   AND OOD.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = GL.LEDGER_ID 
   AND GL.LEDGER_ID = GJH.LEDGER_ID 
   AND GPS.LEDGER_ID = 1 
   AND GPS.APPLICATION_ID = 101 
   AND GJH.STATUS = 'P' 
   AND GJH.JE_HEADER_ID = GJL.JE_HEADER_ID 
   AND GJL.CODE_COMBINATION_ID = GCC.CODE_COMBINATION_ID 
   AND GCC.SEGMENT1 = '"&ENTITY&"' 
   AND GCC.SEGMENT3 in ( 
    '05500',
    '05505',
    '05510',
    '05540',
    '05530',
    '05550')
   "
   , CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"JE_CATEGORY", "JE Category"}, {"JE_SOURCE", "JE Source"}, {"CURRENCY_CODE", "Currency Code"}, {"POSTED_DATE", "Posted Date"}, {"EFFECTIVE_DATE", "Effective Date"}, {"PERIOD_NAME", "GL Period Name"}, {"ACCOUNTED_DR", "Accounted Dr"}, {"ACCOUNTED_CR", "Accounted Cr"}, {"ACCOUNTED_NET", "Accounted Net"}, {"DESCRIPTION", "JE Description"}, {"SEGMENT1", "Entity"}, {"SEGMENT2", "Department"}, {"SEGMENT3", "Account"}, {"SEGMENT4", "Project"}, {"SEGMENT5", "Intercompany"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Corporate_FX_Rate = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
 SELECT
    from_currency,
    to_currency,
    gdr.conversion_date,
    gdr.conversion_type,
    gdr.conversion_Rate usd_rate,
    CASE
        WHEN sob.currency_code = from_currency THEN
            'Yes'
        ELSE
            'No'
    END from_base_currency
FROM
    apps.gl_daily_rates_v                gdr,
    apps.org_organization_definitions    ood,
    apps.gl_sets_of_books                sob
WHERE
        conversion_type = 'Corporate'
    AND to_currency = 'USD'
    AND ood.set_of_books_id = sob.set_of_books_id
    AND ood.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"FROM_CURRENCY", "From Currency"}, {"TO_CURRENCY", "To Currency"}, {"CONVERSION_DATE", "Conversion Date"}, {"CONVERSION_TYPE", "Conversion Type"}, {"USD_RATE", "USD Rate"}, {"FROM_BASE_CURRENCY", "From Base Currency Flag"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Inventory_Value = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT
   INVV.GL_PERIOD,
   INVV.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID,
   INVV.ITEM_NUMBER,
   INVV.ITEM_DESC,
   NVL(INVV.ORG_CATEGORY_ID,INVV.CATEGORY_ID) KEY_CATEGORY_ID,
   INVV.ITEM_TBU,
   INVV.ITEM_PRODUCT_FAMILY,
   INVV.SOURCE_TYPE,
   INVV.ITEM_COST,
   INVV.COST_INCURRED,
   INVV.COST_RELIEVED,
   INVV.COST_VARIANCE,
   INVV.JE_SOURCE_CATEGORY,
   INVV.OPERATIONS_REPORTING,
   INVV.CS_DEMAND_SOURCE,
   INVV.CS_SUPPLY_SOURCE,
   INVV.EXCLUDE_FLAG,
   INVV.EXCLUDE_COMMENT,
   INVV.WIP_CLASS,
   INVV.WIP_CLASS_CODE,
   INVV.ITEM_TYPE,
   INVV.PLANNER_CODE,
   SUBSTR(INVV.ABC_CLASS, 1, 1)ABC_CLASS,
   INVV.ITEM_STATUS,
   INVV.INV_STATUS,
   INVV.SUBINVENTORY_CODE,
   INVV.ACCOUNT,
   INVV.INV_QUANTITY,
   INVV.INV_VALUE,
   INVV.INV_VALUE_USD,
   INVV.FISCAL_PERIOD_ID,
   INVV.FISCAL_WEEK_ID,
   INVV.FISCAL_WEEK,
   (INVV.FISCAL_YEAR * 100 + INVV.FISCAL_WEEK_ID) WEEK_SERIES,
   INVV.SCENARIO,
   INVV.FISCAL_MONTH,
   INVV.MATERIAL_COST,
   INVV.MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_COST,
   INVV.OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_COST,
   INVV.OVERHEAD_COST,
   INVV.RESOURCE_COST,
   INVV.WIP_JOB_ID,
   INVV.WIP_JOB_NO,
   ROUND(INVV.CURRENCY_RATE, 4) USD_RATE,
   INVV.FIN_PRODUCT_GROUP,
   INVV.FIN_PRODUCT_FAMILY,
   INVV.FIN_FORECAST_FIELD,
   INVV.FIN_PRODUCT_SEGMENT,
   INVV.FIN_PRODUCT_LINE,
   INVV.CREATION_DATE
FROM
   XXFACTS.XX_INVVALUE_FACT INVV,
   APPS.MTL_PARAMETERS MP
WHERE
   MP.ORGANIZATION_ID = INVV.INV_ORG_ID 
   AND MP.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"'
   AND INVV.FISCAL_YEAR >= (
        SELECT
            period_year - 5
        FROM
            gl.gl_periods gp
        WHERE
            trunc(sysdate) BETWEEN gp.start_date AND gp.end_date
            AND period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'
    )
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"GL_PERIOD", "Period Name"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"ITEM_DESC", "Item Description"}, {"ITEM_TBU", "Item TBU"}, {"ITEM_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Item Product Family"}, {"SOURCE_TYPE", "Value Source"}, {"ITEM_COST", "Item Cost"}, {"COST_INCURRED", "Cost Incurred"}, {"COST_RELIEVED", "Cost Relieved"}, {"COST_VARIANCE", "Cost Variance"}, {"JE_SOURCE_CATEGORY", "JE Source Category"}, {"OPERATIONS_REPORTING", "Operations Reporting"}, {"CS_DEMAND_SOURCE", "Demand Source"}, {"CS_SUPPLY_SOURCE", "Supply Source"}, {"EXCLUDE_FLAG", "Exclude Flag"}, {"EXCLUDE_COMMENT", "Exclude Comment"}, {"WIP_CLASS", "WIP Class"}, {"WIP_CLASS_CODE", "WIP Class Code"}, {"ITEM_TYPE", "Item Type"}, {"PLANNER_CODE", "Planner Code"}, {"ABC_CLASS", "ABC Class"}, {"ITEM_STATUS", "Item Status"}, {"INV_STATUS", "Supply Chain Status"}, {"SUBINVENTORY_CODE", "Subinventory"}, {"ACCOUNT", "Account Code"}, {"INV_QUANTITY", "Inventory Quantity"}, {"INV_VALUE", "Inventory Value"}, {"INV_VALUE_USD", "Inventory Value USD"}, {"WIP_JOB_NO", "WIP Job Number"}, {"SCENARIO", "Scenario"}, {"MATERIAL_COST", "Material Cost"}, {"MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_COST", "Material Overhead Cost"}, {"OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_COST", "OSP Cost"}, {"RESOURCE_COST", "Resource Cost"}, {"OVERHEAD_COST", "Overhead Cost"}, {"USD_RATE", "USD Rate"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_GROUP", "Finance Product Group"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Finance Product Family"}, {"FIN_FORECAST_FIELD", "Finance Forecast Field"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_SEGMENT", "Finance Product Segment"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_LINE", "Finance Product Line"}, {"CREATION_DATE", "Creation Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Inventory_Value_Weekly = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT
   INVV.GL_PERIOD,
   INVV.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID,
   INVV.ITEM_NUMBER,
   INVV.ITEM_DESC,
   NVL(INVV.ORG_CATEGORY_ID,INVV.CATEGORY_ID) KEY_CATEGORY_ID,
   INVV.ITEM_TBU,
   INVV.ITEM_PRODUCT_FAMILY,
   INVV.SOURCE_TYPE,
   INVV.ITEM_COST,
   INVV.COST_INCURRED,
   INVV.COST_RELIEVED,
   INVV.COST_VARIANCE,
   INVV.JE_SOURCE_CATEGORY,
   INVV.OPERATIONS_REPORTING,
   INVV.CS_DEMAND_SOURCE,
   INVV.CS_SUPPLY_SOURCE,
   INVV.EXCLUDE_FLAG,
   INVV.EXCLUDE_COMMENT,
   INVV.WIP_CLASS,
   INVV.WIP_CLASS_CODE,
   INVV.ITEM_TYPE,
   INVV.PLANNER_CODE,
   SUBSTR(INVV.ABC_CLASS, 1, 1)ABC_CLASS,
   INVV.ITEM_STATUS,
   INVV.INV_STATUS,
   INVV.SUBINVENTORY_CODE,
   INVV.ACCOUNT,
   INVV.INV_QUANTITY,
   INVV.INV_VALUE,
   INVV.INV_VALUE_USD,
   INVV.FISCAL_PERIOD_ID,
   INVV.FISCAL_WEEK_ID,
   INVV.FISCAL_WEEK,
   (INVV.FISCAL_YEAR * 100 + INVV.FISCAL_WEEK_ID) WEEK_SERIES,
   INVV.SCENARIO,
   INVV.FISCAL_MONTH,
   INVV.MATERIAL_COST,
   INVV.MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_COST,
   INVV.OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_COST,
   INVV.OVERHEAD_COST,
   INVV.RESOURCE_COST,
   INVV.WIP_JOB_ID,
   INVV.WIP_JOB_NO,
   ROUND(INVV.CURRENCY_RATE, 4) USD_RATE,
   INVV.FIN_PRODUCT_GROUP,
   INVV.FIN_PRODUCT_FAMILY,
   INVV.FIN_FORECAST_FIELD,
   INVV.FIN_PRODUCT_SEGMENT,
   INVV.FIN_PRODUCT_LINE,
   INVV.CREATION_DATE
FROM
   XXFACTS.XX_INVVALUE_FACT INVV,
   APPS.MTL_PARAMETERS MP
WHERE
   MP.ORGANIZATION_ID = INVV.INV_ORG_ID 
   AND MP.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"'
   AND INVV.FISCAL_YEAR >= (
        SELECT
            period_year - 3
        FROM
            gl.gl_periods gp
        WHERE
            trunc(sysdate) BETWEEN gp.start_date AND gp.end_date
            AND period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'
    )
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"GL_PERIOD", "Period Name"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"ITEM_DESC", "Item Description"}, {"ITEM_TBU", "Item TBU"}, {"ITEM_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Item Product Family"}, {"SOURCE_TYPE", "Value Source"}, {"ITEM_COST", "Item Cost"}, {"COST_INCURRED", "Cost Incurred"}, {"COST_RELIEVED", "Cost Relieved"}, {"COST_VARIANCE", "Cost Variance"}, {"JE_SOURCE_CATEGORY", "JE Source Category"}, {"OPERATIONS_REPORTING", "Operations Reporting"}, {"CS_DEMAND_SOURCE", "Demand Source"}, {"CS_SUPPLY_SOURCE", "Supply Source"}, {"EXCLUDE_FLAG", "Exclude Flag"}, {"EXCLUDE_COMMENT", "Exclude Comment"}, {"WIP_CLASS", "WIP Class"}, {"WIP_CLASS_CODE", "WIP Class Code"}, {"ITEM_TYPE", "Item Type"}, {"PLANNER_CODE", "Planner Code"}, {"ABC_CLASS", "ABC Class"}, {"ITEM_STATUS", "Item Status"}, {"INV_STATUS", "Supply Chain Status"}, {"SUBINVENTORY_CODE", "Subinventory"}, {"ACCOUNT", "Account Code"}, {"INV_QUANTITY", "Inventory Quantity"}, {"INV_VALUE", "Inventory Value"}, {"INV_VALUE_USD", "Inventory Value USD"}, {"WIP_JOB_NO", "WIP Job Number"}, {"SCENARIO", "Scenario"}, {"MATERIAL_COST", "Material Cost"}, {"MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_COST", "Material Overhead Cost"}, {"OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_COST", "OSP Cost"}, {"RESOURCE_COST", "Resource Cost"}, {"OVERHEAD_COST", "Overhead Cost"}, {"USD_RATE", "USD Rate"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_GROUP", "Finance Product Group"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Finance Product Family"}, {"FIN_FORECAST_FIELD", "Finance Forecast Field"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_SEGMENT", "Finance Product Segment"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_LINE", "Finance Product Line"}, {"CREATION_DATE", "Creation Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
